alert.note: Alert for Grant; Winn (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 19 at 1:21AM CDT until June 19 at 2:00AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Grant Parish in north central Louisiana... Southwestern Winn Parish in north central Louisiana... * Until 200 AM CDT. * At 120 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles west of Winnfield, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Winnfield, Calvin, Atlanta and Joyce. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
